mapper.select: select id, title, contents as content, hit, date_format(reg_date, '%Y-%m-%d %h:%i:%s') as regDate, g_no as gNo, o_no as oNo, depth, user_id as userId from board where id =#{id}

select a.id, a.title, a.contents as content, a.hit, date_format(a.reg_date, '%Y-%m-%d %h:%i:%s') as regDate, a.g_no as gNo, a.o_no as oNo, a.depth, a.user_id as userId, b.name as userName from board a join user b on a.user_id = b.id where a.title like #{keyword} order by g_no desc, o_no asc limit #{startIndex}, #{size}
select count(*) from board where title like #{keyword}
